com.ibm.atp.auth
Class AuthByDigest

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.atp.auth.Auth
      com.ibm.atp.auth.AuthByDigest

public class AuthByDigest
extends Auth

The AuthByDigest class is the class for challenge-response authentication by message digest.

Version:
1.00 $Date: 2009/07/28 07:04:53 $

ONO Kouichi
